Text: The International Sustainability Standards Board (ISSB) requires companies to disclose Scope 1, Scope 2, and Scope 3 greenhouse gas emissions.
######################
Output:
("entity"<|>International Sustainability Standards Board (ISSB)<|>disclosure standard<|>A global body that develops sustainability-related disclosure standards, including climate reporting requirements)
##
("entity"<|>Scope 1 emissions<|>disclosure topic<|>Direct greenhouse gas emissions from sources owned or controlled by the organization)
##
("entity"<|>Scope 2 emissions<|>disclosure topic<|>Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from purchased electricity, heat, or steam consumed by the organization)
##
("entity"<|>Scope 3 emissions<|>disclosure topic<|>All other indirect greenhouse gas emissions occurring in the value chain of the reporting organization)
##
("relationship"<|>Scope 1 emissions<|>ISSB<|>RequiredBy)
##
("relationship"<|>Scope 2 emissions<|>ISSB<|>RequiredBy)
##
("relationship"<|>Scope 3 emissions<|>ISSB<|>RequiredBy)
<|COMPLETE|>
